algorithms

Class Tools

  • java.lang.Object
    • algorithms.Tools

  • public class Tools
extends java.lang.Object
    Gathered tools used by routing algorithms, tests and GUI.

    • Method Detail

      • heuristics

        public double heuristics(int y,
                int x,
                int heuristic,
                Vertex whereTo)
        Implementations of A*, JPS heuristics. When Dijkstra (no heuristics) selected, returns -1
        Parameters:
        y - y coordinate of current vertex
        x - x coordinate of current vertex
        heuristic - selected heuristic
        Returns:
        estimate distance to goal

      • shortestPath

        public Stack<Vertex> shortestPath(Vertex goal,
                         Vertex start)
        Finds the shortest path from Vertex[][] path. Used by the run() method after finding the goal.
        Parameters:
        goal - The vertex at the goal (end point).
        start - The vertex at the start.
        Returns:
        the best route as an ArrayList of vertices.

      • getNeighbors

        public Queue<Vertex> getNeighbors(Vertex[][] map,
                         Vertex u,
                         java.lang.String directions)
        Gets the neighbors of a given vertex on the map.
        Parameters:
        u - the vertex whose neighbors are desired.
        Returns:
        a list of the neighbors

      • getAllNeighbors

                            Vertex u)
        Gets the all neighbors of a given vertex on the map.
        Parameters:
        u - the vertex whose neighbors are desired.
        Returns:
        a list of the neighbors

      • valid

        public boolean valid(int y,
            int x,
            Vertex[][] map)
        True if coordinate is walkable and within the map, false otherwise.
        Parameters:
        y - y coordinate.
        x - x coordinate.
        map - Vertex[][] map.
        Returns:
        boolean valid.

        Returns:

      • closestValidCoordinate

        public int[] closestValidCoordinate(Vertex[][] vertexMatrix,
                           int[] coord)
        Checks that coordinate is valid, if not, returns the closest valid coordinate. Moves coordinate to within the map and uses Dijkstra(Astar, NO_HEURISTIC) with utilitymode.
        Parameters:
        coord - coordinate to be validated.
        Returns:
        closest valid coordinate. Null if vertexMatrix not loaded.
